text: The list of shipwrecks in September 1857 includes ships sunk, wrecked or otherwise lost during September 1857. ==1 September== :For the loss of Drake on this date, see the entry for 30 August 1857. ==2 September== ==3 September== ==4 September== ==5 September== ==6 September== ==7 September== ==8 September== ==9 September== ==10 September== ==11 September== ==12 September== ==13 September== ==14 September== ==15 September== ==16 September== ==17 September== ==18 September== ==19 September== ==20 September== ==21 September== ==22 September== ==23 September== ==24 September== ==25 September== ==26 September== ==27 September== ==28 September== ==29 September== ==30 September== ==Unknown date== ==References== 1857-09
title: List of shipwrecks in September 1857
